class PeekingIterator implements Iterator<Integer> {    private LinkedList<Integer> queue;    public PeekingIterator(Iterator<Integer> iterator) {        // initialize any member here.        queue = new LinkedList<>();        // æŠŠ iterator ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ æ”¾åˆ°é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­        while (iterator.hasNext()) {            queue.add(iterator.next());        }    }    // Returns the next element in the iteration without advancing the iterator.    public Integer peek() {        return queue.peek();    }    // hasNext() and next() should behave the same as in the Iterator interface.    // Override them if needed.    @Override    public Integer next() {        return queue.poll();    }    @Override    public boolean hasNext() {        return !queue.isEmpty();    }}

ç¼“å­˜ top

class PeekingIterator implements Iterator<Integer> {    Iterator<Integer> iter;    Integer top;    public PeekingIterator(Iterator<Integer> iterator) {        // initialize any member here.        iter = iterator;        // top != null è¡¨ç¤ºå·²ç»è°ƒç”¨è¿‡ peek()ï¼Œtop å°±æ˜¯ iterator çš„é¡¶éƒ¨å…ƒç´         // top == null è¡¨ç¤ºè¿˜æ²¡è°ƒç”¨è¿‡ peek()ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶åº”è¯¥ä½¿ top = iterator çš„é¡¶éƒ¨å…ƒç´         top = null;    }    // Returns the next element in the iteration without advancing the iterator.    public Integer peek() {        if (top != null) {            return top;        }        // top == nullï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºè°ƒç”¨è¿‡äº† next()ï¼Œä½¿åŸæ¥çš„ top ä¸¢å¤±äº†        top = iter.next();        return top;    }    // hasNext() and next() should behave the same as in the Iterator interface.    // Override them if needed.    @Override    public Integer next() {        if (top == null) {            return iter.next();        }        // åŸæ¥çš„ top å·²ç»åœ¨ peek() çš„æ—¶å€™åˆ é™¤äº†        // è¿™æ—¶ä¸èƒ½å†è°ƒç”¨ next()        int res = top;        // æ–°çš„ top æ­¤æ—¶è¿˜æ²¡æ›´æ–°ï¼Œè¦ç”± peek() èµ‹å€¼        top = null;        return res;    }    @Override    public boolean hasNext() {        return top != null && iter.hasNext();    }}

977. æœ‰åºæ•°ç»„çš„å¹³æ–¹

public int[] sortedSquares(int[] A) {    int len = A.length;    int left = 0, right = len - 1;    int i = right;    int[] res = new int[len];    while (i >= 0) {        int l = A[left] * A[left];        int r = A[right] * A[right];        if (l > r) {            res[i] = l;            left++;        } else {            res[i] = r;            right--;        }        i--;    }    return res;}

public Node connect(Node root) {    if (root == null) {        return null;    }    Node levelStart = root;    while (levelStart.left != null) {        Node cur = levelStart;        while (cur != null) {            // å­èŠ‚ç‚¹è¿æ¥ï¼Œåªè¦ left å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œright ä¸€å®šå­˜åœ¨            cur.left.next = cur.right;            // å‘å³è¿æ¥            if (cur.next != null) {                cur.right.next = cur.next.left;            }            // æ¨ªå‘è¿æ¥            cur = cur.next;        }        // è¿›å…¥ä¸‹ä¸€å±‚        levelStart = levelStart.left;    }    return root;}

class MyQueue {    /**     * ç”¨äºå…¥æ ˆ     */    ArrayDeque<Integer> addStack;    /**     * ç”¨äºå‡ºæ ˆï¼ˆå‡ºé˜Ÿï¼‰     */    ArrayDeque<Integer> popStack;    /**     * Initialize your data structure here.     */    public MyQueue() {        addStack = new ArrayDeque<>();        popStack = new ArrayDeque<>();    }    /**     * Push element x to the back of queue.     */    public void push(int x) {        addStack.push(x);    }    /**     * Removes the element from in front of queue and returns that element.     */    public int pop() {        // è‹¥ popStack ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™å°† addStack çš„æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ å‹å…¥ popStack        if (popStack.isEmpty()) {            int size = addStack.size();            while (size-- > 0) {                int top = addStack.pop();                popStack.push(top);            }        }        // æ ˆé¡¶å³ä¸ºé˜Ÿå¤´        return popStack.pop();    }    /**     * Get the front element.     */    public int peek() {        // è‹¥ popStack ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™å°† addStack çš„æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ å‹å…¥ popStack        if (popStack.isEmpty()) {            int size = addStack.size();            while (size-- > 0) {                int top = addStack.pop();                popStack.push(top);            }        }        // æ ˆé¡¶å³ä¸ºé˜Ÿå¤´        return popStack.peek();    }    /**     * Returns whether the queue is empty.     */    public boolean empty() {        return addStack.isEmpty() && popStack.isEmpty();    }}

class MyStack {    LinkedList<Integer> queue;    /**     * Initialize your data structure here.     */    public MyStack() {        queue = new LinkedList<>();    }    /**     * Push element x onto stack.     */    public void push(int x) {        int size = queue.size();        queue.offer(x);        // x ä¹‹å‰çš„å…ƒç´ é‡æ–°å…¥é˜Ÿï¼Œx å˜ä¸ºé˜Ÿå¤´ï¼Œå³æ ˆé¡¶        for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {            queue.offer(queue.poll());        }    }    /**     * Removes the element on top of the stack and returns that element.     */    public int pop() {        return queue.poll();    }    /**     * Get the top element.     */    public int top() {        return queue.peek();    }    /**     * Returns whether the stack is empty.     */    public boolean empty() {        return queue.isEmpty();    }}

class MinStack {    LinkedList<Integer> stack;    LinkedList<Integer> minStack;    /**     * initialize your data structure here.     */    public MinStack() {        stack = new LinkedList<>();        minStack = new LinkedList<>();    }    public void push(int x) {        stack.push(x);        if (!minStack.isEmpty()) {            // æ ˆä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå–æœ€å°å€¼            minStack.push(Math.min(x, getMin()));        }        // æ ˆç©ºï¼Œx å°±æ˜¯æœ€å°çš„        else {            minStack.push(x);        }    }    public void pop() {        stack.pop();        minStack.pop();    }    public int top() {        return stack.peek();    }    public int getMin() {        return minStack.peek();    }}

class MinStack {    /**     * å­˜å‚¨å®é™…çš„æ ˆå…ƒç´      */    ArrayDeque<Integer> dataStack;    /**     * å­˜å‚¨æœ€å°å€¼     */    ArrayDeque<Integer> minStack;    /**     * initialize your data structure here.     */    public MinStack() {        dataStack = new ArrayDeque<>();        minStack = new ArrayDeque<>();    }    public void push(int x) {        dataStack.push(x);        // å…¥æ ˆå…ƒç´  <= minï¼Œåˆ™åŠ å…¥æœ€å°æ ˆ        if (!minStack.isEmpty()) {            if (x <= getMin()) {                minStack.push(x);            }        } else {            minStack.push(x);        }    }    public void pop() {        int top = dataStack.pop();        // å‡ºæ ˆå…ƒç´ å³ä¸ºæœ€å°å€¼ï¼Œæ›´æ–°æœ€å°å€¼        if (top == getMin()) {            minStack.pop();        }    }    public int top() {        return dataStack.peek();    }    public int getMin() {        return minStack.peek();    }}

public String simplifyPath(String path) {    ArrayDeque<String> stack = new ArrayDeque<>();    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();    int len = path.length();    // å¤šåˆ†é…ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºé—´ï¼Œå¤„ç†ä¸æ˜¯ä»¥ '/' ç»“å°¾çš„æƒ…å†µ    char[] str = new char[len + 1];    System.arraycopy(path.toCharArray(), 0, str, 0, len);    // å°¾éƒ¨å¤šåˆ†é… '/'    str[len] = '/';    stack.push("");    for (int i = 1; i <= len; i++) {        if (str[i] == '/') {            String folder = sb.toString();            sb.setLength(0);            // 0 æˆ– 1 ä¸ª '.' è¿˜åœ¨å½“å‰ç›®å½•            if ("".equals(folder) || ".".equals(folder)) {                continue;            }            // 2 ä¸ªç‚¹è¿”å›ä¸Šä¸€çº§ç›®å½•            if ("..".equals(folder)) {                // å½“å‰ç›®å½•ä¸æ˜¯æ ¹ç›®å½•æ‰å¯è¿”å›ä¸Šä¸€çº§                if (!"".equals(stack.peek())) {                    stack.pop();                }            } else {                // è¿›å…¥ä¸‹ä¸€çº§ç›®å½•                stack.push(folder);            }        } else {            sb.append(str[i]);        }    }    List<String> folders = new ArrayList<>();    while (!stack.isEmpty()) {        folders.add(stack.pop());    }    // ç›®å½•é•¿åº¦ == 1ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶åªæœ‰æ ¹ç›®å½• = ''    if (folders.size() > 1) {        folders.remove(folders.size() - 1);    }    Collections.reverse(folders);    sb.setLength(0);    for (String folder : folders) {        sb.append("/");        sb.append(folder);    }    return sb.toString();}

entry.title: LeetCode 410. åˆ†å‰²æ•°ç»„çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼
entry.content:
410. åˆ†å‰²æ•°ç»„çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼

public int splitArray(int[] nums, int m) {    /* å­æ•°ç»„çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ maxOfSub in [max(nums), sum(nums)]         å½“åˆ†æˆ nums.length ä¸ªå­æ•°ç»„æ—¶ï¼ŒmaxOfSub æœ€å° = max(nums)         å½“åˆ†æˆ 1 ä¸ªå­æ•°ç»„æ—¶ï¼ŒmaxOfSub æœ€å¤§ = sum(nums)       åˆ†å‰²æ–¹æ¡ˆè¶Šå¤šï¼Œåˆ™ maxOfSub è¶Šå°ï¼Œåä¹‹è¶Šå¤§       è‹¥ maxOfSub å¯¹åº”çš„åˆ†å‰²æ–¹æ¡ˆ > mï¼Œè¯´æ˜ æ­¤æ—¶æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°åº”å‡å°‘ï¼ŒmaxOfSub å¤ªå°ï¼Œåˆ™åº”å¢å¤§ maxOfSub     */    int left = nums[0], right = 0;    for (int num : nums) {        left = Math.max(left, num);        right += num;    }    while (left < right) {        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;        // å°è¯•ä»¥ mid ä¸ºå­æ•°ç»„çš„æœ€å¤§å’Œåˆ’åˆ†æ•°ç»„        int numOfSplit = splitBySubArraySum(mid, nums);        if (numOfSplit > m) {            // å­æ•°ç»„ä¸ªæ•°å¤ªå¤šï¼Œåˆ™å‡å°‘ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå¢å¤§å­æ ‘æ•°ç»„å’Œ            left = mid + 1;        } else {            right = mid;        }    }    return left;}/** * æ ¹æ®å­æ•°ç»„çš„å’Œè·å–åˆ’åˆ†çš„å­æ•°ç»„ä¸ªæ•° * * @param maxSum å­æ•°ç»„çš„æœ€å¤§å’Œ * @param nums * @return */private int splitBySubArraySum(int maxSum, int[] nums) {    // è‡³å°‘å¯ä»¥åˆ’åˆ†æˆä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„    int count = 1;    // å½“å‰å­æ•°ç»„çš„å’Œ    int curSum = 0;    for (int num : nums) {        curSum += num;        // è‹¥å½“å‰æ•° + å­æ•°ç»„çš„å’Œ > æœ€å¤§å’Œï¼Œåˆ™åˆ’åˆ†ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å­æ•°ç»„        if (curSum > maxSum) {            count++;            // é‡æ–°å¼€å§‹åˆ’åˆ†å­æ•°ç»„            curSum = num;        }    }    return count;}

å¯çœŸèƒ½åƒï¼Œä¸ä»…åƒå¾—å¤šï¼Œè¿˜åƒå¾—ä¹…ï¼Œè¿˜åƒè¶…æ—¶äº†ã€‚

public int minEatingSpeed(int[] piles, int H) {    int maxSpeed = piles[0];    for (int num : piles) {        maxSpeed = Math.max(maxSpeed, num);    }    int left = 1, right = maxSpeed;    while (left < right) {        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;        // è®¡ç®— speed = mid æ—¶çš„è€—æ—¶        int eatTime = eatInSpeed(mid, piles);        // System.out.println("left=" + left + " mid = " + mid + " right=" + right + " time=" + eatTime);        if (eatTime > H) {            // åƒå¤ªä¹…äº†ï¼ŒåŠ å¿«é€Ÿåº¦ [mid + 1, right]            left = mid + 1;        } else {            right = mid;        }    }    return left;}private int eatInSpeed(int speed, int[] piles) {    // è€—æ—¶    int time = 0;    for (int pile : piles) {        // å‘ä¸Šå–æ•´        time += (pile + speed - 1) / speed;    }    return time;}

public int maxSideLength(int[][] mat, int threshold) {    int m = mat.length, n = mat[0].length;    // è®¡ç®—å‰ç¼€å’Œ    int[][] dp = new int[m + 1][n + 1];    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {            dp[i][j] = mat[i - 1][j - 1] + dp[i - 1][j] + dp[i][j - 1] - dp[i - 1][j - 1];        }    }    int res = 0;    // æœ€å¤§çš„æ­£æ–¹å½¢è¾¹é•¿    int maxSideLen = Math.min(m, n);    // éå†æ¯ä¸ªå¯èƒ½çš„è¾¹é•¿æ‰€ç»„æˆçš„æ­£æ–¹å½¢    for (int k = 1; k <= maxSideLen; k++) {        // ä»¥ dp[i][j]ä¸ºå³ä¸‹è§’ è®¡ç®—æ­£æ–¹å½¢        for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {            for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {                // æ— æ³•ç»„æˆæ­£æ–¹å½¢                if (k > i || k > j) {                    continue;                }                int rect = dp[i][j] - dp[i - k][j] - dp[i][j - k] + dp[i - k][j - k];                // æ›´æ–°æœ€å¤§è¾¹é•¿                if (rect <= threshold) {                    res = Math.max(k, res);                }            }        }    }    return res;}

å‰ç¼€å’Œ + äºŒåˆ†

public int maxSideLength(int[][] mat, int threshold) {    int m = mat.length, n = mat[0].length;    // è®¡ç®—å‰ç¼€å’Œ    int[][] dp = new int[m + 1][n + 1];    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {            dp[i][j] = mat[i - 1][j - 1] + dp[i - 1][j] + dp[i][j - 1] - dp[i - 1][j - 1];        }    }    // æœ€å¤§çš„æ­£æ–¹å½¢è¾¹é•¿    int right = Math.min(m, n);    int left = 0;    while (left < right) {        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;        boolean canIncrease = verifyRect(dp, threshold, mid, m, n);        if (canIncrease) {            // mid å¯¹åº”çš„æ­£æ–¹å½¢æ»¡è¶³è¦æ±‚ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¢å¤§            left = mid;        } else {            right = mid - 1;        }    }    return left;}/** * åˆ¤æ–­ä»¥ len ä¸ºè¾¹é•¿çš„æ­£æ–¹å½¢æ˜¯å¦èƒ½æ»¡è¶³ threshold * * @param dp * @param threshold * @param len * @param m * @param n * @return */private boolean verifyRect(int[][] dp, int threshold, int len, int m, int n) {    // ä»¥ dp[i][j] ä¸ºå³ä¸‹è§’ è®¡ç®—æ­£æ–¹å½¢    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {            // æ— æ³•ç»„æˆæ­£æ–¹å½¢            if (len > i || len > j) {                continue;            }            int sum = dp[i][j] - dp[i - len][j] - dp[i][j - len] + dp[i - len][j - len];            if (sum <= threshold) {                return true;            }        }    }    return false;}

public int smallestDivisor(int[] nums, int threshold) {    int right = Integer.MIN_VALUE;    for (int num : nums) {        right = Math.max(right, num);    }    int left = 1;    while (left < right) {        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;        int sum = calcSum(nums, mid);        if (sum > threshold) {            left = mid + 1;        } else {            right = mid;        }    }    return left;}private int calcSum(int[] nums, int divider) {    int sum = 0;    for (int num : nums) {        // å‘ä¸Šå–æ•´æŠ€å·§ï¼Œå¿«å¾—å¾ˆï¼        sum += (num + divider - 1) / divider;    }    return sum;}

public int findDuplicate(int[] nums) {    int len = nums.length;    // [2, 4, 5, 2, 3, 1, 6, 7]    // mid = 4, è‹¥ [left, mid] ä¸å­˜åœ¨é‡å¤å…ƒç´     // åˆ™ [left, mid] ä¸­ <= mid çš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°æœ€å¤šä¸º mid ä¸ª    int left = 1, right = len - 1;    while (left < right) {        int mid = (left + right) >>> 1;        int count = 0;        // è®¡ç®— æ•°ç»„é‡Œå°äºç­‰äº mid çš„ä¸ªæ•°        for (int num : nums) {            if (num <= mid) {                count += 1;            }        }        // è‹¥ count > midï¼Œåˆ™ [left, mid] å­˜åœ¨é‡å¤å…ƒç´         if (count > mid) {            right = mid;        } else {            left = mid + 1;        }    }    return left;}

å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆ

åŸåœ°å“ˆå¸Œå’Œç¯å½¢é“¾è¡¨æ‰¾å…¥å£çš„æ€è·¯ç»“åˆã€‚
41. ç¼ºå¤±çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ•°

public int findDuplicate(int[] nums) {    int slow = 0, fast = 0;    while (true) {        fast = nums[nums[fast]];        slow = nums[slow];        // fast = 2 * slow = slow + n * circle        // slow = n * circle        if (fast == slow) {            break;        }    }    // ä»èµ·ç‚¹åŒæ—¶èµ° a æ­¥ï¼Œåœ¨ç¯çš„å…¥å£ç›¸é‡    // n * circle + a <=> 0 + a    fast = 0;    while (fast != slow) {        fast = nums[fast];        slow = nums[slow];    }    return slow;}

public int getMinimumDifference(TreeNode root) {    ArrayDeque<TreeNode> stack = new ArrayDeque<>();    TreeNode curNode = root;    int pre = Integer.MAX_VALUE, res = Integer.MAX_VALUE;    while (!stack.isEmpty() || curNode != null) {        while (curNode != null) {            stack.push(curNode);            curNode = curNode.left;        }        TreeNode top = stack.pop();        // è®¡ç®—å½“å‰ç»“ç‚¹å’Œä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„å·®å€¼        res = Math.min(Math.abs(top.val - pre), res);        // å½“å‰å€¼ä½œä¸º pre        pre = top.val;        // éå†å³å­æ ‘        curNode = top.right;    }    return res;}

é€’å½’

int res = Integer.MAX_VALUE;TreeNode prevNode;public int getMinimumDifference(TreeNode root) {    if (root == null) {        return 0;    }    inOrder(root);    return res;}private void inOrder(TreeNode root) {    if (root == null) {        return;    }    // éå†å·¦å­æ ‘    inOrder(root.left);    // è®¡ç®—æœ€å°å·®å€¼    if (prevNode != null) {        res = Math.min(res, root.val - prevNode.val);    }    // æ›´æ–°å‰ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹    prevNode = root;    // éå†å³å­æ ‘    inOrder(root.right);}

public double findMedianSortedArrays(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {    int m = nums1.length, n = nums2.length;    int len = m + n;    // nums1, nums2 å¯¹åº”æŒ‡é’ˆ    int i = 0, j = 0;    // ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡éå†åˆ°çš„æ•°ï¼Œå½“å‰éå†åˆ°çš„æ•°    int prev = -1, cur = -1;    for (int k = 0; k <= len / 2; k++) {        prev = cur;        // åœ¨ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸­å–å°çš„æ•°å¾€åç§»        if (i == m) {            // nums1 éå†å®Œæˆ            cur = nums2[j++];        } else if (j == n) {            // nums2 éå†å®Œæˆ            cur = nums1[i++];        } else if (nums1[i] < nums2[j]) {            cur = nums1[i++];        } else {            cur = nums2[j++];        }    }    if (len % 2 == 0) {        return (prev + cur) / 2.0;    } else {        return cur;    }}

public int findBestValue(int[] arr, int target) {    int len = arr.length;    if (len == 0) {        return 0;    }    int max = arr[0];    for (int num : arr) {        max = Math.max(max, num);    }    int left = 0, right = max;    while (left < right) {        int mid = left + (right - left + 1) / 2;        int sum = getSum(arr, mid);        if (sum == target) {            return mid;        } else {            // çœ‹ mid å’Œ mid - 1 å“ªä¸ªçš„å’Œæ›´æ¥è¿‘ target            int prev = Math.abs(getSum(arr, mid - 1) - target);            int midVal = Math.abs(sum - target);            if (prev <= midVal) {                right = mid - 1;            } else {                left = mid;            }        }    }    return left;}private int getSum(int[] arr, int val) {    int sum = 0;    for (int num : arr) {        sum += Math.min(num, val);    }    return sum;}

public List<List<Integer>> findSolution(CustomFunction customfunction, int z) {    List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();    // x: 1 -> z    for (int i = 1; i <= z; i++) {        // x: 1 -> z äºŒåˆ†        int left = 1, right = z;        while (left <= right) {            int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;            if (customfunction.f(i, mid) == z) {                List<Integer> pair = new ArrayList<>();                pair.add(i);                pair.add(mid);                res.add(pair);                break;            } else if (customfunction.f(i, mid) > z) {                right = mid - 1;            } else {                left = mid + 1;            }        }    }    return res;}

åŒæŒ‡é’ˆ

public List<List<Integer>> findSolution(CustomFunction customfunction, int z) {    List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();    int low = 1, high = z;    while (low <= z && high >= 1) {        int r = customfunction.f(low, high);        if (r > z) {            high--;        } else if (r < z) {            low++;        } else {            List<Integer> pair = new ArrayList<>();            pair.add(low);            pair.add(high);            res.add(pair);            low++;            high--;        }    }    return res;}

entry.title: LeetCode 1095. å±±è„‰æ•°ç»„ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾ç›®æ ‡å€¼

1095. å±±è„‰æ•°ç»„ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾ç›®æ ‡å€¼

public int findInMountainArray(int target, MountainArray mountainArr) {        int len = mountainArr.length();        // è·å–å±±é¡¶        int top = getTop(len, mountainArr);        // åœ¨å·¦è¾¹æŸ¥æ‰¾        int ascPos = findInAsc(0, top, target, mountainArr);        if (ascPos != -1) {            return ascPos;        }        // åœ¨å³è¾¹æŸ¥æ‰¾        return findInDesc(top, len - 1, target, mountainArr);    }    private int findInAsc(int left, int right, int target, MountainArray mountainArr) {        while (left < right) {            int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;            int midVal = mountainArr.get(mid);            if (midVal == target) {                return mid;            } else if (midVal > target) {                right = mid;            } else {                left = mid + 1;            }        }        return mountainArr.get(left) == target ? left : -1;    }    private int findInDesc(int left, int right, int target, MountainArray mountainArr) {        while (left < right) {            int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;            int midVal = mountainArr.get(mid);            if (midVal == target) {                return mid;            } else if (midVal > target) {                left = mid + 1;            } else {                right = mid;            }        }        return mountainArr.get(left) == target ? left : -1;    }    private int getTop(int len, MountainArray mountainArr) {        int left = 0, right = len - 1;        while (left < right) {            int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;            // 3, 4, 5, 2, 1            if (mountainArr.get(mid) < mountainArr.get(mid + 1)) {                left = mid + 1;            } else {                right = mid;            }        }        return left;    }

  • åŒºé—´éƒ½ä¸å…·æœ‰ç›¸åŒçš„èµ·å§‹ç‚¹ => å¯ä»¥ä¿å­˜æ’åºå‰çš„èµ·ç‚¹å’Œç´¢å¼•çš„å…³ç³»ã€‚
public int[] findRightInterval(int[][] intervals) {    int len = intervals.length;    if (len == 0) {        return new int[0];    }    int[] res = new int[len];    int[] starts = new int[len];    Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        // å­˜å‚¨èµ·ç‚¹        starts[i] = intervals[i][0];        // å­˜å‚¨æ¯ä¸ªèµ·ç‚¹çš„åŸå§‹ä½ç½®        map.put(intervals[i][0], i);    }    Arrays.sort(starts);    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        // åœ¨èµ·ç‚¹æ•°ç»„ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾èµ·ç‚¹ï¼Œè¯¥èµ·ç‚¹ >= åŒºé—´ i çš„ç»ˆç‚¹        int index = binarySearch(starts, intervals[i][1]);        res[i] = index == -1 ? -1 : map.get(starts[index]);    }    return res;}/** * æŸ¥æ‰¾ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª >= end çš„åŒºé—´èµ·ç‚¹ * * @param starts * @param end * @return */private int binarySearch(int[] starts, int end) {    int len = starts.length;    if (starts[len - 1] < end) {        return -1;    }    int left = 0, right = len - 1;    while (left < right) {        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;        if (starts[mid] < end) {            left = mid + 1;        } else {            right = mid;        }    }    return left;}

public int hIndex(int[] citations) {    int len = citations.length;    if (len == 0 || citations[len - 1] == 0) {        return 0;    }    int left = 0, right = len - 1;    while (left < right) {        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;        // å¼•ç”¨æ¬¡æ•°ï¼šcitations[h]        // è®ºæ–‡æ•°ï¼šlen - h        // h index : (å¼•ç”¨æ¬¡æ•° >= h çš„è®ºæ–‡æ•°) >= h ç¯‡        if (citations[mid] >= len - mid) {            right = mid;        } else {            left = mid + 1;        }    }    return len - left;}

public int[][] findContinuousSequence(int target) {    List<int[]> list = new ArrayList<>();    int left = 1, right = 1;    int sum = 0;    int len = target / 2 + 1;    while (right <= len) {        sum += right;        right++;        while (sum > target) {            sum -= left;            left++;        }        if (sum == target) {            int[] arr = new int[right - left];            for (int i = left, j = 0; i < right; i++) {                arr[j++] = i;            }            list.add(arr);        }    }    int[][] res = new int[list.size()][];    int i = 0;    for (int[] arr : list) {        res[i++] = arr;    }    return res;}

entry.title: LeetCode 34. åœ¨æ’åºæ•°ç»„ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾å…ƒç´ çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå’Œæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®

34. åœ¨æ’åºæ•°ç»„ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾å…ƒç´ çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå’Œæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®

public int[] searchRange(int[] nums, int target) {        int len = nums.length;        if (len == 0) {            return new int[]{-1, -1};        }        int first = findFirstPos(nums, 0, len - 1, target);        if (first == -1) {            return new int[]{-1, -1};        }        int last = findLastPos(nums, 0, len - 1, target);        return new int[]{first, last};    }    // 1 2 3    // 0 1 2    private int findFirstPos(int[] nums, int left, int right, int target) {        while (left < right) {            int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;            // æœç´¢å¼€å§‹ä½ç½®ï¼šæ›´æ–°å·¦è¾¹ç•Œ            if (nums[mid] < target) {                // [mid + 1, right]                left = mid + 1;            } else {                // nums[mid] >= target                // [left, mid]                right = mid;            }        }        return nums[left] == target ? left : -1;    }    // 5 7 7 8 8 10    // 0 1 2 3 4  5    private int findLastPos(int[] nums, int left, int right, int target) {        while (left < right) {            int mid = left + (right - left + 1) / 2;            // æœç´¢ç»“æŸä½ç½®ï¼šæ›´æ–°å³è¾¹ç•Œ            if (nums[mid] > target) {                // [left, mid - 1]                right = mid - 1;            } else {                // nums[mid] <= target                // [mid, right]                left = mid;            }        }        return left;    }

public int[] twoSum(int[] numbers, int target) {    int left = 0, right = numbers.length - 1;    while (left < right) {        int sum = numbers[left] + numbers[right];        if (target > sum) {            left++;        } else if (target < sum) {            right--;        } else {            return new int[]{left + 1, right + 1};        }    }    return new int[2];}

public int[] twoSum(int[] numbers, int target) {    int len = numbers.length;    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        int right = binarySearch(numbers, i + 1, len - 1, target - numbers[i]);        if (right != -1) {            return new int[]{i + 1, right + 1};        }    }    return new int[2];}private int binarySearch(int[] nums, int left, int right, int target) {    while (left < right) {        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;        if (nums[mid] == target) {            return mid;        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {            right = mid;        } else {            left = mid + 1;        }    }    return nums[left] == target ? left : -1;}

public List<List<Integer>> fourSum(int[] nums, int target) {    Arrays.sort(nums);    List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();    int len = nums.length;    for (int i = 0; i < len - 3; i++) {        if (i > 0 && nums[i] == nums[i - 1]) {            continue;        }        // æŸ¥æ‰¾ ä¸‰æ•°ä¹‹å’Œ        for (int j = i + 1; j < len - 2; j++) {            if (j > i + 1 && nums[j] == nums[j - 1]) {                continue;            }            int left = j + 1;            int right = len - 1;            while (left < right) {                int sum = nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[left] + nums[right];                if (sum == target) {                    res.add(Arrays.asList(nums[i], nums[j], nums[left], nums[right]));                    // è·³è¿‡é‡å¤æ•°å­—                    while (left < right && nums[left] == nums[left + 1]) {                        left++;                    }                    while (left < right && nums[right] == nums[right - 1]) {                        right--;                    }                    left++;                    right--;                } else if (sum > target) {                    right--;                } else {                    left++;                }            }        }    }    return res;}

public int trap(int[] height) {    int len = height.length;    int res = 0;    LinkedList<Integer> stack = new LinkedList<>();    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        // å•è°ƒé€’å‡æ ˆ        while (!stack.isEmpty() && height[i] > height[stack.peek()]) {            // æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ æœ¬æ¬¡è®¡ç®—çš„æ°´ï¼Œæ–°çš„æ ˆé¡¶ä¸ºå·¦è¾¹ç•Œï¼Œi ä¸ºå³è¾¹ç•Œ            // peek() < heightOfTop < i            int top = height[stack.pop()];            if (stack.isEmpty()) {                break;            }            // è®¡ç®— top ä¸Šé¢èƒ½æ”¾å¤šå°‘æ°´            int h = Math.min(height[i], height[stack.peek()]) - top;            int w = i - stack.peek() - 1;            res += h * w;        }        stack.push(i);    }    return res;}

åˆ†åˆ«æ‰¾åˆ°å½“å‰åˆ—çš„å·¦å³æœ€é«˜ç‚¹ï¼Œè®¡ç®—ç§¯æ°´ã€‚

public int trap(int[] height) {    int res = 0;    int len = height.length;    // æœ€å·¦è¾¹å’Œæœ€å³è¾¹æ— æ³•ä¿å­˜æ°´ï¼Œå¯è·³è¿‡    for (int i = 1; i < len - 1; i++) {        // æ‰¾å‡ºå·¦è¾¹æœ€é«˜çš„åˆ—        int leftMax = 0;        for (int j = i - 1; j >= 0; j--) {            leftMax = Math.max(leftMax, height[j]);        }        // æ‰¾å‡ºå³è¾¹æœ€é«˜çš„åˆ—        int rightMax = 0;        for (int j = i + 1; j < len; j++) {            rightMax = Math.max(rightMax, height[j]);        }        // å½“å‰åˆ—å‡å°äº å·¦è¾¹å’Œå³è¾¹æ—¶ï¼Œå½“å‰åˆ—æ‰èƒ½ä¿å­˜æ°´        int minHeight = Math.min(leftMax, rightMax);        if (minHeight > height[i]) {            res += minHeight - height[i];        }    }    return res;}

åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’

public int trap(int[] height) {    int res = 0;    int len = height.length;    int[] leftMax = new int[len];    int[] rightMax = new int[len];    // è®¡ç®—å·¦è¾¹æœ€é«˜    for (int i = 1; i < len; i++) {        leftMax[i] = Math.max(leftMax[i - 1], height[i - 1]);    }    // è®¡ç®—å³è¾¹æœ€é«˜    for (int i = len - 2; i > 0; i--) {        rightMax[i] = Math.max(rightMax[i + 1], height[i + 1]);    }    for (int i = 1; i < len - 1; i++) {        int minHeight = Math.min(leftMax[i], rightMax[i]);        if (minHeight > height[i]) {            res += minHeight - height[i];        }    }    return res;}

public int threeSumClosest(int[] nums, int target) {    Arrays.sort(nums);    int len = nums.length;    int res = nums[0] + nums[1] + nums[2];    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        if (i > 0 && nums[i] == nums[i - 1]) {            continue;        }        int left = i + 1;        int right = len - 1;        while (left < right) {            int sum = nums[i] + nums[left] + nums[right];            if (sum == target) {                return res;            }            if (Math.abs(target - sum) < Math.abs(target - res)) {                res = sum;            }            if (sum > target) {                right--;            } else {                left++;            }        }    }    return res;}

public List<List<Integer>> threeSum(int[] nums) {    List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();    int len = nums.length;    Arrays.sort(nums);    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        // é‡å¤æ•°å­—        if (i > 0 && nums[i] == nums[i - 1]) {            continue;        }        // å½“å‰ä¸ºæ­£æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™ä¹‹åéƒ½ä¸ºæ­£æ•°ï¼Œå’Œä¸å¯èƒ½ä¸º 0        if (nums[i] > 0) {            return res;        }        int left = i + 1;        int right = len - 1;        while (left < right) {            int sum = nums[left] + nums[right] + nums[i];            if (sum == 0) {                res.add(Arrays.asList(nums[i], nums[left], nums[right]));                // å»é‡                while (left < right && nums[left] == nums[left + 1]) {                    left++;                }                // å»é‡                while (left < right && nums[right] == nums[right - 1]) {                    right--;                }                // æŸ¥æ‰¾ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå¯è¡Œè§£                left++;                right--;            } else if (sum > 0) {                // å³å€¼åå¤§                right--;            } else {                // å·¦å€¼åå°                left++;            }        }    }    return res;}

public int maxArea(int[] height) {    int left = 0, right = height.length - 1;    int max = 0;    while (left < right) {        int area = Math.min(height[left], height[right]) * (right - left);        max = Math.max(max, area);        if (height[left] < height[right]) {            left++;        } else {            right--;        }    }    return max;}

Set

public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {    char[] chars = s.toCharArray();    int left = 0, right = 0;    int len = chars.length;    Set<Character> set = new HashSet<>();    int maxLen = 0;    while (right < len) {        char c = chars[right];        right++;        while (set.contains(c)) {            set.remove(chars[left]);            left++;        }        set.add(c);        maxLen = Math.max(maxLen, right - left);    }    return maxLen;}

HashMap

è®°å½•å­—ç¬¦çš„æœ€åä¸€æ¬¡å‡ºç°ä½ç½®ã€‚

public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {    char[] chars = s.toCharArray();    int left = 0, right = 0;    int len = chars.length;    Map<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();    int maxLen = 0;    while (right < len) {        char c = chars[right];        if (map.containsKey(c)) {            left = Math.max(map.get(c) + 1, left);        }        map.put(c, right);        maxLen = Math.max(maxLen, right - left + 1);        right++;    }    return maxLen;}

æ•°ç»„å“ˆå¸Œ

è®°å½•å­—ç¬¦å‡ºç°æ¬¡æ•°

public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {    char[] chars = s.toCharArray();    int left = 0, right = 0;    int len = chars.length;    int[] freq = new int[128];    int maxLen = 0;    while (right < len) {        char c = chars[right];        right++;        // æ”¶ç¼©å·¦è¾¹ç•Œï¼Œç›´åˆ° right å¯¹åº”å­—ç¬¦æœªå‡ºç°        while (freq[c] > 0) {            freq[chars[left]]--;            left++;        }        freq[c]++;        maxLen = Math.max(maxLen, right - left);    }    return maxLen;}

entry.title: LeetCode 995. K è¿ç»­ä½çš„æœ€å°ç¿»è½¬æ¬¡æ•°

public int minKBitFlips(int[] A, int K) {    int len = A.length;    int count = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        if (A[i] == 1) {            continue;        }        // A[i] == 0ï¼Œä½†åé¢æ²¡æœ‰ K ä½ï¼Œæ— æ³•ç¿»è½¬        if (i + K > len) {            return -1;        }        // é‡åˆ° 0 å°±åè½¬        count++;        for (int j = i; j < i + K; j++) {            A[j] ^= 1;        }    }    return count;}
public int minKBitFlips(int[] A, int K) {    int len = A.length;    ArrayDeque<Integer> queue = new ArrayDeque<>();    int count = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        // i ä¸åœ¨å‰å‡ æ¬¡çš„ç¿»è½¬å­æ•°ç»„ä¸­        while (!queue.isEmpty() && queue.peekFirst() + K <= i) {            queue.poll();        }        // åœ¨ [i - k + 1, i - 1] ç¿»è½¬ä¸­        // 1 ç¿»è½¬å¥‡æ•°æ¬¡åå˜ä¸º 0        // 0 ç¿»è½¬å¶æ•°æ¬¡åå˜ä¸º 1ï¼Œè¿™ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µéœ€è¦å†æ¬¡ç¿»è½¬        if (queue.size() % 2 == A[i]) {            // å‰©ä¸‹ä¸è¶³ K ä½ï¼Œæ— æ³•ç¿»è½¬            if (i + K > len) {                return -1;            }            count++;            queue.add(i);        }    }    return count;}

public int equalSubstring(String s, String t, int maxCost) {    char[] sChar = s.toCharArray();    char[] tChar = t.toCharArray();    int len = s.length();    int left = 0, right = 0;    int windowCost = 0;    int maxLen = 0;    while (right < len) {        // è®¡ç®—çª—å£å†…å­—ç¬¦ä»£ä»·        windowCost += Math.abs(sChar[right] - tChar[right]);        right++;        // æ”¶ç¼©å·¦è¾¹ç•Œ        if (windowCost > maxCost) {            windowCost -= Math.abs(sChar[left] - tChar[left]);            left++;        }        // è®¡ç®—æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦        maxLen = Math.max(maxLen, right - left);    }    return maxLen;}

public int maxSatisfied(int[] customers, int[] grumpy, int X) {    int len = customers.length;    int sum = 0;    int left = 0, right = 0;    int windowComplement = 0;    int maxComp = 0;    while (right < len) {        if (grumpy[right] == 1) {            // å¯è¡¥å……çš„å€¼            windowComplement += customers[right];        } else {            // åŸå§‹å€¼            sum += customers[right];        }        right++;        // çª—å£å¤§å° = X        if (right - left >= X) {            maxComp = Math.max(maxComp, windowComplement);            if (grumpy[left] == 1) {                windowComplement -= customers[left];            }            left++;        }    }    return sum + maxComp;}
public int maxSatisfied(int[] customers, int[] grumpy, int X) {    int len = customers.length;    int sum = 0;    int left = 0, right = 0;    int windowComplement = 0;    int maxComp = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        if (grumpy[i] == 0) {            sum += customers[i];            customers[i] = 0;        }    }    while (right < len) {        windowComplement += customers[right];        right++;        // çª—å£å¤§å° = X        if (right - left >= X) {            maxComp = Math.max(maxComp, windowComplement);            windowComplement -= customers[left];            left++;        }    }    return sum + maxComp;}

public int maxScore(int[] cardPoints, int k) {    int len = cardPoints.length;    int leftSum = 0;    int rightSum = 0;    // å³è¾¹ k ä¸ªä¹‹å’Œ    for (int i = len - 1; i >= len - k; i--) {        rightSum += cardPoints[i];    }    // å·¦è¾¹å– 0 ä¸ª    int max = rightSum;    // ä»å·¦è¾¹å¼€å§‹å– 1 ~ k ä¸ª    for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {        leftSum += cardPoints[i];        // å‡å»å³è¾¹å¤šçš„éƒ¨åˆ†: 1 -> k - 1, 2 -> k - 2......        rightSum -= cardPoints[len - k + i];        max = Math.max(max, leftSum + rightSum);    }    return max;}

class MaxQueue {    private LinkedList<Integer> queue;    private ArrayDeque<Integer> deque;    public MaxQueue() {        // ä¿å­˜å…¥é˜Ÿå…ƒç´         queue = new LinkedList<>();        // æœ€å¤§å€¼é˜Ÿåˆ—        deque = new ArrayDeque<>();    }    public int max_value() {        return deque.isEmpty() ? -1 : deque.peekFirst();    }    public void push_back(int value) {        queue.addLast(value);        // æ›´æ–°æœ€å¤§å€¼        while (!deque.isEmpty() && deque.peekLast() < value) {            deque.pollLast();        }        deque.addLast(value);    }    public int pop_front() {        int front = queue.isEmpty() ? -1 : queue.pollFirst();        // å‡ºé˜Ÿå…ƒç´ ä¸ºæœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™ä»æœ€å¤§å€¼é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­å‡ºé˜Ÿ        if (!deque.isEmpty() && deque.peekFirst().equals(front)) {            deque.pollFirst();        }        return front;    }}

public int longestOnes(int[] A, int K) {    int len = A.length;    int left = 0, right = 0;    int windowCount = 0, max = 0;    while (right < len) {        if (A[right] == 1) {            windowCount++;        }        right++;        // å¯æ›¿æ¢çš„ 0 ä¸ªæ•° > K, æ”¶ç¼©å·¦è¾¹ç•Œ        while (right - left - windowCount > K) {            if (A[left] == 1) {                windowCount--;            }            left++;        }        max = Math.max(max, right - left);    }    return max;}

public int findMaxConsecutiveOnes(int[] nums) {    int len = nums.length;    if (len == 0) {        return 0;    }    int count = 0;    int max = 0;    for (int num : nums) {        if (num == 1) {            count++;        } else {            max = Math.max(max, count);            count = 0;        }    }    return Math.max(max, count);}
public int findMaxConsecutiveOnes(int[] nums) {    int len = nums.length;    int left = 0, right = 0;    int max = 0;    while (right < len) {        if (nums[right] == 0) {            max = Math.max(right - left, max);            left = right + 1;        }        right++;    }    return Math.max(right - left, max);}

public int maxVowels(String s, int k) {    char[] chars = s.toCharArray();    int left = 0, right = 0;    int max = 0;    int len = chars.length;    int validLen = 0;    char[] vowels = {'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'};    int[] needs = new int[26];    for (char c : vowels) {        needs[c - 'a']++;    }    while (right < len) {        int cur = chars[right] - 'a';        // å½“å‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸ºå…ƒéŸ³        if (needs[cur] > 0) {            validLen++;        }        right++;        // é•¿åº¦æ»¡è¶³è¦æ±‚ï¼Œå¯»æ‰¾æœ€ä¼˜è§£ï¼Œæ”¶ç¼©å·¦è¾¹ç•Œ        if (right - left == k) {            max = Math.max(max, validLen);            int leftPos = chars[left] - 'a';            // å½“å‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸ºå…ƒéŸ³            if (needs[leftPos] > 0) {                validLen--;            }            left++;        }    }    return max;}

public int[] maxSlidingWindow(int[] nums, int k) {    int len = nums.length;    if (len == 0) {        return new int[]{};    }    ArrayDeque<Integer> queue = new ArrayDeque<>();    int[] res = new int[len - k + 1];    int j = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        while (!queue.isEmpty() && nums[queue.peekLast()] < nums[i]) {            queue.removeLast();        }        queue.addLast(i);        if (queue.peekFirst() <= i - k) {            queue.removeFirst();        }        if (i >= k - 1) {            res[j++] = nums[queue.peekFirst()];        }    }    return res;}

public int maxTurbulenceSize(int[] A) {    // [9,4,2,10,7,8,8,1,9]    // dp[i]: ä»¥ç¬¬ i ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ç»“å°¾çš„æœ€å¤§å­æ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦    /*      if A[i] == A[i - 1]        dp[i] = 1      if A[i - 2], A[i - 1] ä¸Šå‡ï¼ˆä¸‹é™ï¼‰        if A[i - 1], A[i] ä¸‹é™ï¼ˆä¸Šå‡ï¼‰           dp[i] = dp[i - 1] + 1        else if A[i - 1], A[i] ä¸Šå‡ï¼ˆä¸‹é™ï¼‰           dp[i] = 2     */    int len = A.length;    if (len < 2) {        return len;    }    int[] dp = new int[len];    Arrays.fill(dp, 1);    dp[1] = A[1] == A[0] ? 1 : 2;    int max = dp[1];    for (int i = 2; i < len; i++) {        // ä¸Šå‡        if (A[i - 2] < A[i - 1]) {            // ä¸‹é™            if (A[i - 1] > A[i]) {                dp[i] = dp[i - 1] + 1;            } else if (A[i - 1] < A[i]) {                dp[i] = 2;            }        }        // ä¸‹é™        else if (A[i - 2] > A[i - 1]) {            // ä¸Šå‡            if (A[i - 1] < A[i]) {                dp[i] = dp[i - 1] + 1;            } else if (dp[i - 1] > dp[i]) {                dp[i] = 2;            }        } else {            // A[i - 2] == A[i - 1]            dp[i] = (A[i] == A[i - 1]) ? 1 : 2;        }        max = Math.max(max, dp[i]);    }    return max;}

æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£

public int maxTurbulenceSize(int[] A) {    int len = A.length;    if (len < 2) {        return len;    }    int left = 0, right = 2;    int maxLen = A[0] == A[1] ? 1 : 2;    while (right < len) {        if (A[right] == A[right - 1]) {            left = right;            right++;            continue;        }        // up        if (A[right - 2] < A[right - 1]) {            // up            if (A[right - 1] < A[right]) {                left = right - 1;            }        }        // down        else if (A[right - 2] > A[right - 1]) {            // down            if (A[right - 1] > A[right]) {                left = right - 1;            }        }        right++;        maxLen = Math.max(maxLen, right - left);    }    return maxLen;}

public double findMaxAverage(int[] nums, int k) {    double sum = 0;    // è®¡ç®—å‰ k ä¸ªå­æ•°ç»„å’Œ    for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {        sum += nums[i];    }    double res = sum;    for (int i = k; i < nums.length; i++) {        // [i, i + 1, ... , i + k, i + k + 1]        // 0, 1, 2, 3, 4        sum = sum - nums[i - k] + nums[i];        res = Math.max(res, sum);    }    return res / k;}

public boolean checkInclusion(String s1, String s2) {    char[] chars1 = s1.toCharArray();    char[] chars2 = s2.toCharArray();    int[] window = new int[26];    int[] needs = new int[26];    for (char c : chars1) {        needs[c - 'a']++;    }    int s1Len = chars1.length;    int s2Len = chars2.length;    int left = 0, right = 0;    int validLen = 0;    while (right < s2Len) {        int curPos = chars2[right] - 'a';        if (needs[curPos] == 0) {            right++;            continue;        }        if (window[curPos] < needs[curPos]) {            validLen++;        }        window[curPos]++;        right++;        while (validLen == s1Len) {            // åªæœ‰å½“å‰çª—å£é•¿åº¦ == s1 æ—¶ï¼Œæ‰ç®—æœ‰æ•ˆçš„æ’åˆ—            if (right - left == s1Len) {                return true;            }            int leftPos = chars2[left] - 'a';            // å·¦è¾¹å­—ç¬¦ä¸åœ¨æ’åˆ—ä¸­            if (needs[leftPos] == 0) {                left++;                continue;            }            // å·¦è¾¹å­—ç¬¦åœ¨æ’åˆ—ä¸­ï¼Œå‡å°æœ‰æ•ˆé•¿åº¦            if (window[leftPos] == needs[leftPos]) {                validLen--;            }            window[leftPos]--;            left++;        }    }    return false;}

å®é™…ä¸Šï¼Œçª—å£å§‹ç»ˆå¢å¤§ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¦æ±‚æœ€é•¿å­ä¸²ï¼Œçª—å£å†…çš„å­—ç¬¦å‡ºç°æ¬¡æ•°åœ¨çª—å£æ”¶ç¼©ä¸€ä½åï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰å¿…è¦è¿›è¡Œæ›´æ–°ã€‚

public int characterReplacement(String s, int k) {    char[] chars = s.toCharArray();    int len = chars.length;    // çª—å£å†…å­—ç¬¦çš„å‡ºç°æ¬¡æ•°    int[] freq = new int[26];    int left = 0, right = 0;    int maxCount = 0;    int maxLen = Integer.MIN_VALUE;    while (right < len) {        int cur = chars[right] - 'A';        freq[cur]++;        right++;        maxCount = Math.max(maxCount, freq[cur]);        // çª—å£å¤§å° - é‡å¤å­—ç¬¦é•¿åº¦ <= k ä¸ªæ›¿æ¢é•¿åº¦æ—¶        // è¡¨ç¤ºå¯ä»¥æ›¿æ¢çš„å­—ç¬¦è¿˜è¾¾ä¸åˆ° k ä¸ªï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å¯ä»¥æ‰©å¤§çª—å£        // æ”¶ç¼© left ä¹‹åï¼Œçª—å£å†…æ­£å¥½å¯æ›¿æ¢ k ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦        // while (right - left - maxCount > k) {        if (right - left - maxCount > k) {            freq[chars[left] - 'A']--;            left++;        }        maxLen = Math.max(maxLen, right - left);    }    return maxLen;}

public int[] maxSlidingWindow(int[] nums, int k) {    int len = nums.length;    int[] res = new int[len - k + 1];    int j = 0;    // å•è°ƒé€’å‡é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼šé˜Ÿé¦– > é˜Ÿå°¾    // ç»´æŠ¤çª—å£å†…çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œå½“é˜Ÿé¦–ä¸åœ¨çª—å£å†…æ—¶åˆ™ç§»é™¤    ArrayDeque<Integer> queue = new ArrayDeque<>();    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        // ç§»é™¤é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æ¯”å½“å‰å€¼å°çš„å…ƒç´         while (!queue.isEmpty() && nums[queue.peekLast()] < nums[i]) {            queue.removeLast();        }        // æ·»åŠ å½“å‰å…ƒç´         queue.add(i);        // åˆ¤æ–­é˜Ÿé¦–å€¼æ˜¯å¦åœ¨çª—å£å†…ï¼Œè‹¥ä¸åœ¨åˆ™ç§»é™¤        if (queue.getFirst() <= i - k) {            queue.removeFirst();        }        // å½¢æˆæœ‰æ•ˆçª—å£å¤§å°        if (i >= k - 1) {            res[j++] = nums[queue.getFirst()];        }    }    return res;}

public int[] maxSlidingWindow(int[] nums, int k) {    int right = 0;    int len = nums.length;    PriorityQueue<Integer> maxHeap = new PriorityQueue<>((o1, o2) -> o2 - o1);    int[] res = new int[len - k + 1];    int i = 0;    while (right < len) {        // å¯å½¢æˆçª—å£        if (maxHeap.size() >= k) {            // åˆ é™¤ä¸åœ¨çª—å£å†…çš„å·¦è¾¹ç•Œ            maxHeap.remove(nums[right - k]);        }        // æ·»åŠ å½“å‰å…ƒç´         maxHeap.add(nums[right]);        if (right >= k - 1) {            res[i++] = maxHeap.peek();        }        right++;    }    return res;}

public int minSubArrayLen(int s, int[] nums) {    int len = nums.length;    int left = 0, right = 0;    int minLen = Integer.MAX_VALUE;    int sum = 0;    while (right < len) {        // è®¡ç®—å‰ç¼€å’Œ        sum += nums[right];        right++;        // å½“å‰ç¼€å’Œ > targetï¼Œå°è¯•å³ç§» left        while (sum >= s) {            // æ›´æ–°æœ€å°é•¿åº¦            if (right - left < minLen) {                minLen = right - left;            }            // å³ç§» left ä¹‹å‰è¦å‡å» left å¯¹åº”çš„å€¼            sum -= nums[left];            left++;        }    }    return minLen == Integer.MAX_VALUE ? 0 : minLen;}

äºŒåˆ†

public int minSubArrayLen(int s, int[] nums) {    int len = nums.length;    if (len == 0) {        return 0;    }    // è®¡ç®—å‰ç¼€å’Œæ•°ç»„    int[] preSum = new int[len];    preSum[0] = nums[0];    for (int i = 1; i < len; i++) {        preSum[i] = nums[i] + preSum[i - 1];    }    int minLen = Integer.MAX_VALUE;    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        int s1 = s - nums[i];        // preSum[i.....j]        // æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ª preSum[j]ï¼Œä½¿å¾— preSum[j] - preSum[i] >= s        int j = binarySearch(preSum, i, len - 1, s1 + preSum[i]);        if (j != -1) {            minLen = Math.min(minLen, j - i + 1);        }    }    return minLen == Integer.MAX_VALUE ? 0 : minLen;}private int binarySearch(int[] preSum, int left, int right, int target) {    int mid = -1;    while (left <= right) {        mid = left + (right - left) / 2;        if (preSum[mid] == target) {            return mid;        } else if (preSum[mid] > target) {            right = mid - 1;        } else {            left = mid + 1;        }    }    // æ‰¾ä¸åˆ° == target çš„ preSum[j]ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª > target çš„å…ƒç´     return preSum[mid] > target ? mid : -1;}

ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªè®¡æ•°å™¨ç»Ÿè®¡çª—å£å†…ç›®æ ‡å­—ç¬¦çš„å‡ºç°æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œå½“æ»¡è¶³è¦æ±‚æ—¶ï¼Œç§»åŠ¨ leftï¼Œå¹¶æ›´æ–°æœ€å°é•¿åº¦ï¼Œè‹¥ç§»é™¤çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸ºç›®æ ‡å­—ç¬¦ï¼Œåˆ™è®¡æ•°å™¨ä¹Ÿè¦å‡å°ã€‚

public String minWindow(String s, String t) {    char[] sChar = s.toCharArray();    char[] tChar = t.toCharArray();    int sLen = s.length();    int tLen = t.length();    // åªç»Ÿè®¡çª—å£å†…ç›®æ ‡å­—ç¬¦çš„å‡ºç°æ¬¡æ•°    int[] window = new int[128];    int[] needs = new int[128];    for (char c : tChar) {        needs[c]++;    }    int left = 0, right = 0, begin = 0, minLen = sLen + 1;    // æ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£å†…åŒ…å« t ä¸­å­—ç¬¦çš„ä¸ªæ•°    int count = 0;    while (right < sLen) {        char c = sChar[right];        // å½“å‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸åœ¨ t ä¸­ï¼Œright å‘å³ç§»åŠ¨        if (needs[c] == 0) {            right++;            continue;        }        // ç»Ÿè®¡çª—å£ä¸­ç›®æ ‡å­—ç¬¦çš„é•¿åº¦        if (window[c] < needs[c]) {            count++;        }        // æ›´æ–°çª—å£ä¸­ç›®æ ‡å­—ç¬¦å‡ºç°æ¬¡æ•°        window[c]++;        right++;        // æœ‰æ•ˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸ªæ•°æ»¡è¶³è¦æ±‚        // [left, right)        while (count == tLen) {            // æ›´æ–°æœ€å°é•¿åº¦            if (right - left < minLen) {                minLen = right - left;                begin = left;            }            // å·¦è¾¹éœ€è¦ç§»é™¤çš„å­—ç¬¦            char leftChar = sChar[left];            // ç§»é™¤çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸åœ¨ç›®æ ‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥ç§»åŠ¨ left            if (needs[leftChar] == 0) {                left++;                continue;            }            // ç§»é™¤çš„å­—ç¬¦å‡ºç°çš„ç›®æ ‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ™å‡å°‘æœ‰æ•ˆå­—ç¬¦é•¿åº¦            if (window[leftChar] == needs[leftChar]) {                count--;            }            window[leftChar]--;            left++;        }    }    if (minLen == sLen + 1) {        return "";    }    return s.substring(begin, begin + minLen);}

entry.title: LeetCode 283. ç§»åŠ¨é›¶

public void moveZeroes(int[] nums) {        // é 0 å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œnums[0:j) != 0        int j = 0;        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {            if (nums[i] != 0) {                int t = nums[i];                nums[i] = nums[j];                nums[j] = t;                j++;            }        }    }

public void sortColors(int[] nums) {    int len = nums.length;    // 0,0,0,.zero.1,1,1,1,1.two.2,2,2,2,2,len    // [0, zero) 0    // [zero, i) 1    // [two, len) 2    // `0` çš„è¾¹ç•Œä» 0 å¼€å§‹    int zero = 0;    // `2` çš„è¾¹ç•Œä»æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¼€å§‹    int two = len - 1;    // éå†èµ·ç‚¹    int i = 0;    // å½“ i == two æ—¶ï¼Œè¿˜å·®ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æœªè®¿é—®    while (i <= two) {        if (nums[i] == 0) {            swap(nums, i, zero);            zero++;            i++;        } else if (nums[i] == 1) {            i++;        } else if (nums[i] == 2) {            // æ­¤æ—¶ä¸éœ€è¦ i++ï¼Œå¦åˆ™äº¤æ¢è¿‡æ¥çš„ nums[i] æœªåˆ¤æ–­            swap(nums, i, two);            two--;        }    }

public String frequencySort(String s) {    char[] chars = s.toCharArray();    Map<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();    List<Character> list = new ArrayList<>();    for (char c : chars) {        if (!list.contains(c)) {            list.add(c);        }        map.put(c, map.getOrDefault(c, 0) + 1);    }    list.sort((o1, o2) -> map.get(o2) - map.get(o1));    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();    for (char c : list) {        int count = map.get(c);        while (count-- > 0) {            sb.append(c);        }    }    return sb.toString();}

å¤§é¡¶å †

public String frequencySort(String s) {    char[] chars = s.toCharArray();    Map<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();    for (char c : chars) {        map.put(c, map.getOrDefault(c, 0) + 1);    }    PriorityQueue<Character> maxHeap = new PriorityQueue<>((o1, o2) -> map.get(o2) - map.get(o1));    for (char c : chars) {        if (!maxHeap.contains(c)) {            maxHeap.add(c);        }    }    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();    while (!maxHeap.isEmpty()) {        char key = maxHeap.poll();        int count = map.get(key);        while (count-- > 0) {            sb.append(key);        }    }    return sb.toString();}

public void rotate(int[] nums, int k) {    int len = nums.length;    // æ¯æ¬¡åè½¬éƒ½æœ‰ k % n ä¸ª æ•°å­—è¢«ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°å‰éƒ¨    k = k % len;    // å…¨éƒ¨åè½¬    reverse(nums, 0, len - 1);    // åè½¬å‰ k ä¸ª    reverse(nums, 0, k - 1);    // åè½¬ len - k ä¸ª    reverse(nums, k, len - 1);}private void reverse(int[] nums, int start, int end) {    while (start < end) {        int t = nums[start];        nums[start] = nums[end];        nums[end] = t;        start++;        end--;    }}

public void rotate(int[] nums, int k) {    int len = nums.length;    for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {        int end = nums[len - 1];        // æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä¾æ¬¡åç§»        for (int j = len - 1; j > 0; j--) {            nums[j] = nums[j - 1];        }        // æœ«å°¾å…ƒç´ ç§»åˆ°å‰é¢        nums[0] = end;    }}

public void rotate(int[] nums, int k) {    int len = nums.length;    int placed = 0;    int start = 0;    while (placed < len) {        int cur = start;        int curVal = nums[cur];        do {            // cur çš„ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®            int next = (cur + k) % len;            int nextVal = nums[next];            nums[next] = curVal;            // ä¸‹ä¸€è½®æ”¾ç½® next            cur = next;            curVal = nextVal;            placed++;        } while (cur != start);        // cur == startï¼Œæ”¾ç½®ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®        start++;        System.out.println(start);    }}

public void merge(int[] nums1, int m, int[] nums2, int n) {    int k = m + n - 1;    m--;    n--;    while (m >= 0 && n >= 0) {        nums1[k--] = nums1[m] > nums2[n] ? nums1[m--] : nums2[n--];    }    while (n >= 0) {        nums1[k--] = nums2[n--];    }}
public void merge(int[] nums1, int m, int[] nums2, int n) {        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {            nums1[m++] = nums2[i];        }        Arrays.sort(nums1);    }

public int[] plusOne(int[] digits) {    int len = digits.length;    for (int i = len - 1; i >= 0; i--) {        digits[i]++;        // è¶…è¿‡ 10ï¼Œåˆ™å¯¹ 10 å–ä½™ï¼Œä¸‹ä¸€ä½è¿›ä½        if (digits[i] >= 10) {            digits[i] = digits[i] % 10;        } else {            // ä¸è¶…è¿‡ 10ï¼Œè¿”å›ç»“æœ            return digits;        }    }    // ç¬¬ä¸€ä½ä¹Ÿè¶…è¿‡ 10ï¼Œåˆ™é•¿åº¦ + 1ï¼Œå¦‚ 999    int[] newDigits = new int[len + 1];    newDigits[0] = 1;    return newDigits;}

åˆ©ç”¨ç´¢å¼•æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå¯¹ç´¢å¼•æ•°ç»„æ’åºï¼Œå°±å¯æ ¹æ®ç´¢å¼•ä¿å­˜å¯¹åº”ä½ç½®çš„é€†åºæ•°ã€‚

public List<Integer> countSmaller(int[] nums) {    int len = nums.length;    List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();    if (len == 0) {        return list;    }    // ç´¢å¼•æ•°ç»„    int[] indexes = new int[len];    // ä¿å­˜æ¯ä¸ªä½ç½®çš„é€†åºæ•°    int[] res = new int[len];    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        indexes[i] = i;    }    mergeSort(indexes, nums, res, 0, len - 1);    for (int count : res) {        list.add(count);    }    return list;}private void mergeSort(int[] indexes, int[] nums, int[] res, int left, int right) {    if (left >= right) {        return;    }    int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;    mergeSort(indexes, nums, res, left, mid);    mergeSort(indexes, nums, res, mid + 1, right);    if (nums[indexes[mid]] <= nums[indexes[mid + 1]]) {        return;    }    mergeAndCountSmaller(indexes, nums, res, left, mid, right);}private void mergeAndCountSmaller(int[] indexes, int[] nums, int[] res, int left, int mid, int right) {    int len = right - left + 1;    int[] tmp = new int[len];    int i = left, j = mid + 1, k = 0;    while (i <= mid && j <= right) {        // æ¯”è¾ƒç´¢å¼•å¯¹åº”ä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„æ•°        if (nums[indexes[i]] <= nums[indexes[j]]) {            // æ›´æ–°æ¯” nums[idx[i]] å°çš„æ•°            res[indexes[i]] += j - mid - 1;            tmp[k++] = indexes[i++];        } else {            tmp[k++] = indexes[j++];        }    }    // åˆå¹¶å‰©ä¸‹çš„æ•°    while (i <= mid) {        // å·¦è¾¹è¿˜æœ‰å‰©ä½™ï¼Œè¯´æ˜å³è¾¹æ¯”å®ƒå°çš„éƒ½å·²ç»å½’å¹¶å›å»äº†        res[indexes[i]] += j - mid - 1;        tmp[k++] = indexes[i++];    }    while (j <= right) {        tmp[k++] = indexes[j++];    }    System.arraycopy(tmp, 0, indexes, left, len);}

public List<Integer> findDuplicates(int[] nums) {    List<Integer> res = new ArrayList<>();    int len = nums.length;    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        while (nums[i] != nums[nums[i] - 1]) {            swap(nums, i, nums[i] - 1);        }    }    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        if (nums[i] != i + 1) {            res.add(nums[i]);        }    }    return res;}private void swap(int[] nums, int i, int j) {    int t = nums[i];    nums[i] = nums[j];    nums[j] = t;}

public List<Integer> findDisappearedNumbers(int[] nums) {    List<Integer> res = new ArrayList<>();    int len = nums.length;    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        while (1 <= nums[i] && nums[i] <= len && nums[i] != nums[nums[i] - 1]) {            swap(nums, i, nums[i] - 1);        }    }    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        if (nums[i] != i + 1) {            res.add(i + 1);        }    }    return res;}private void swap(int[] nums, int i, int j) {    int t = nums[i];    nums[i] = nums[j];    nums[j] = t;}

public int firstMissingPositive(int[] nums) {    int len = nums.length;    if (len == 0) {        return 1;    }    Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();    for (int num : nums) {        map.put(num, 1);    }    for (int i = 1; i <= len + 1; i++) {        if (!map.containsKey(i)) {            return i;        }    }    return -1;}

public int firstMissingPositive(int[] nums) {    int len = nums.length;    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        // nums[i] = i + 1        // æœªå‡ºç°çš„æ•°ä¸€å®šåœ¨ [1, len + 1]        while (nums[i] > 0 && nums[i] <= len && nums[i] != nums[nums[i] - 1]) {            swap(nums, i, nums[i] - 1);        }    }    // å½“ ç¬¬ i ä¸ªä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„æ•°ä¸æ˜¯ i + 1 æ—¶ï¼Œè¯´æ˜ i + 1 æ²¡æœ‰å‡ºç°è¿‡    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        if (nums[i] != i + 1) {            return i + 1;        }    }    return len + 1;}private void swap(int[] nums, int i, int j) {    int t = nums[i];    nums[i] = nums[j];    nums[j] = t;}

å¿«æ’

æ€æƒ³ï¼šæ’åºåç¬¬ k ä¸ªæœ€å¤§å…ƒç´ ä½ç½® = len - kï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡ partition åï¼Œéƒ½ä¼šå°† pivot ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°å…¶æœ€ç»ˆä½ç½®ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å°±å¯æ¯”è¾ƒè¯¥ä½ç½®æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®ã€‚

public int findKthLargest(int[] nums, int k) {    int len = nums.length;    // æ’åºåç¬¬ k å¤§çš„æ•°æ‰€åœ¨ä½ç½®    int target = len - k;    return quickSort(nums, target, 0, len - 1);}private int quickSort(int[] nums, int target, int left, int right) {    int pivotPos = partition(nums, left, right);    // æ‰¾åˆ°ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®ï¼Œè¿”å›    if (pivotPos == target) {        return nums[target];    } else if (pivotPos > target) {        // æ¯”ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®å¤§ï¼Œåˆ™å¾€å‰æŸ¥æ‰¾        return quickSort(nums, target, left, pivotPos - 1);    } else {        return quickSort(nums, target, pivotPos + 1, right);    }}private int partition(int[] nums, int left, int right) {    int pivot = nums[left];    while (left < right) {        while (left < right && nums[right] >= pivot) {            right--;        }        nums[left] = nums[right];        while (left < right && nums[left] <= pivot) {            left++;        }        nums[right] = nums[left];    }    nums[left] = pivot;    return left;}

ä¼˜å…ˆé˜Ÿåˆ—

å°é¡¶å †

public int findKthLargest(int[] nums, int k) {    // å°é¡¶å † => å¼¹å‡ºæ¯” ç›®æ ‡å°çš„ len - k ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œå †é¡¶å³ä¸ºç¬¬ k å¤§    PriorityQueue<Integer> minHeap = new PriorityQueue<>();    for (int num : nums) {        minHeap.add(num);    }    for (int i = 0; i < nums.length - k; i++) {        minHeap.poll();    }    return minHeap.peek();}

å¤§é¡¶å †

public int findKthLargest(int[] nums, int k) {    int len = nums.length;    // å¤§é¡¶å † => å¼¹å‡ºæ¯” ç›®æ ‡å¤§çš„ k - 1 ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œå †é¡¶å³ä¸ºç¬¬ k å¤§    PriorityQueue<Integer> maxHeap = new PriorityQueue<>(len, (a, b) -> b - a);    for (int num : nums) {        maxHeap.add(num);    }    for (int i = 0; i < k - 1; i++) {        maxHeap.poll();    }    return maxHeap.peek();}

å †æ’åº

æ¯æ¬¡è°ƒæ•´éƒ½æŠŠæœ€å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ æ”¾åˆ°åé¢ï¼Œå› æ­¤è¦æ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¬ K å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ åªéœ€è¦éå† K æ¬¡ã€‚

æˆ–è€…ï¼šä½¿ç”¨å°é¡¶å †

  1. å¯¹ K ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å…ˆå»ºå †
  2. éå†å‰©ä¸‹çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œè‹¥å¤§äºå †é¡¶ï¼Œåˆ™åŠ å…¥å †å¹¶è°ƒæ•´ã€‚
  3. å †é¡¶å…ƒç´ å³ä¸ºç¬¬ K å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ 
public int findKthLargest(int[] nums, int k) {    int len = nums.length;    // å°†æ•°ç»„æ•´ç†æˆå †    heapify(nums);    // å¾ªç¯ä¸å˜é‡ï¼šåŒºé—´ [0, i] å †æœ‰åº    // æ¯æ¬¡è°ƒæ•´éƒ½æŠŠæœ€å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ æ”¾åˆ°åé¢    // å› æ­¤è¦æ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¬ K å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ åªéœ€è¦éå† K æ¬¡    for (int i = len - 1; i > len - 1 - k; ) {        // æŠŠå †é¡¶å…ƒç´ ï¼ˆå½“å‰æœ€å¤§ï¼‰äº¤æ¢åˆ°æ•°ç»„æœ«å°¾        swap(nums, 0, i);        // é€æ­¥å‡å°‘å †æœ‰åºçš„éƒ¨åˆ†        i--;        // ä¸‹æ ‡ 0 ä½ç½®ä¸‹æ²‰æ“ä½œï¼Œä½¿å¾—åŒºé—´ [0, i] å †æœ‰åº        siftDown(nums, 0, i);    }    return nums[len - k];}/** * å°†æ•°ç»„æ•´ç†æˆå †ï¼ˆå †æœ‰åºï¼‰ * * @param nums */private void heapify(int[] nums) {    int len = nums.length;    // åªéœ€è¦ä» i = (len - 1) / 2 è¿™ä¸ªä½ç½®å¼€å§‹é€å±‚ä¸‹ç§»    for (int i = (len - 1) / 2; i >= 0; i--) {        siftDown(nums, i, len - 1);    }}/** * @param nums * @param k    å½“å‰ä¸‹æ²‰å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸‹æ ‡ * @param end  [0, end] æ˜¯ nums çš„æœ‰æ•ˆéƒ¨åˆ† */private void siftDown(int[] nums, int k, int end) {    while (2 * k < end) {        int j = 2 * k + 1;        // å·¦ç»“ç‚¹ < å³ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œj æŒ‡å‘å³ç»“ç‚¹        if (j < end && nums[j + 1] > nums[j]) {            j++;        }        // å­ç»“ç‚¹å¤§äºçˆ¶ç»“ç‚¹        if (nums[j] > nums[k]) {            swap(nums, j, k);        } else {            break;        }        k = j;    }}private void swap(int[] nums, int i, int j) {    int temp = nums[i];    nums[i] = nums[j];    nums[j] = temp;}

entry.title: å‰‘æŒ‡ Offer 51. æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„é€†åºå¯¹
entry.content:
å‰‘æŒ‡ Offer 51. æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„é€†åºå¯¹

public int reversePairs(int[] nums) {    return reverse(nums, 0, nums.length - 1);}private int reverse(int[] nums, int left, int right) {    if (left >= right) {        return 0;    }    int mid = left + ((right - left) >> 1);    int leftPairs = reverse(nums, left, mid);    int rightPairs = reverse(nums, mid + 1, right);    if (nums[mid] <= nums[mid + 1]) {        return leftPairs + rightPairs;    }    // åœ¨å³åŒºé—´çš„å…ƒç´ åˆå¹¶æ—¶ï¼Œè®¡ç®—å¤§äºè¯¥å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸ªæ•°    // å·¦åŒºé—´çš„æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ éƒ½å¤§äºè¯¥å…ƒç´ ï¼Œåˆ™é€†åºæ•° = å·¦åŒºé—´é•¿åº¦ = mid - i + 1    int crossPairs = mergeAndCount(nums, left, mid, right);    return leftPairs + crossPairs + rightPairs;}private int mergeAndCount(int[] nums, int left, int mid, int right) {    int count = 0;    int len = right - left + 1;    int[] tmp = new int[len];    int i = left, j = mid + 1, k = 0;    // [left, mid] [mid + 1, right]    while (i <= mid && j <= right) {        if (nums[j] < nums[i]) {            tmp[k++] = nums[j++];            // è®¡ç®—å·¦åŒºé—´é•¿åº¦            count += mid - i + 1;        } else {            tmp[k++] = nums[i++];        }    }    while (i <= mid) {        tmp[k++] = nums[i++];    }    while (j <= right) {        tmp[k++] = nums[j++];    }    System.arraycopy(tmp, 0, nums, left, len);    return count;}

entry.title: LeetCode 912. æ’åºæ•°ç»„
entry.content:
912. æ’åºæ•°ç»„

public int[] sortArray(int[] nums) {    mergeSort(nums, 0, nums.length - 1);    return nums;}private void mergeSort(int[] nums, int low, int high) {    if (low < high) {        int mid = (low + high) >>> 1;        mergeSort(nums, low, mid);        mergeSort(nums, mid + 1, high);        merge(nums, low, mid, high);    }}private void merge(int[] nums, int low, int mid, int high) {    int len = high - low + 1;    int[] tmp = new int[len];    // [low...mid] [mid + 1, high]    int i = low, j = mid + 1, k = 0;    while (i <= mid && j <= high) {        tmp[k++] = nums[i] > nums[j] ? nums[j++] : nums[i++];    }    while (i <= mid) {        tmp[k++] = nums[i++];    }    while (j <= high) {        tmp[k++] = nums[j++];    }    System.arraycopy(tmp, 0, nums, low, len);}private void quickSort(int[] nums, int low, int high) {    if (low < high) {        int pivotPos = partition(nums, low, high);        quickSort(nums, low, pivotPos - 1);        quickSort(nums, pivotPos + 1, high);    }}private int partition(int[] nums, int low, int high) {    int cur = nums[low];    while (low < high) {        while (low < high && cur <= nums[high]) {            high--;        }        nums[low] = nums[high];        while (low < high && cur >= nums[low]) {            low++;        }        nums[high] = nums[low];    }    nums[low] = cur;    return low;}

entry.title: LeetCode 350. ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„çš„äº¤é›† II
entry.content:

å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨

public int[] intersect(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {    List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();    // map ä¸­å­˜å‚¨æ¯ä¸ªæ•°çš„å‡ºç°æ¬¡æ•°    Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();    for (int num : nums1) {        map.put(num, map.getOrDefault(num, 0) + 1);    }    for (int key : nums2) {        if (!map.containsKey(key)) {            continue;        }        int count = map.get(key);        // å‡ºç°æ¬¡æ•°å¤§äº 1 æ‰æœ‰æ•ˆ        if (count > 0) {            list.add(key);            // æ›´æ–°å‰©ä¸‹çš„æ¬¡æ•°            map.put(key, count - 1);        }    }    int k = 0;    int[] res = new int[list.size()];    for (int num : list) {        res[k++] = num;    }    return res;}

public int[] intersect(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {    List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();    Arrays.sort(nums1);    Arrays.sort(nums2);    int i = 0, j = 0;    while (i < nums1.length && j < nums2.length) {        if (nums1[i] == nums2[j]) {            list.add(nums1[i]);            i++;            j++;        } else if (nums1[i] > nums2[j]) {            j++;        } else {            i++;        }    }    int k = 0;    int[] res = new int[list.size()];    for (int num : list) {        res[k++] = num;    }    return res;}

public int[] intersection(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {    Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();    Set<Integer> set = new HashSet<>();    for (int num : nums1) {        map.put(num, map.getOrDefault(num, 0) + 1);    }    for (int key : nums2) {        if (map.containsKey(key)) {            set.add(key);        }    }    int[] res = new int[set.size()];    int i = 0;    for (int num : set) {        res[i++] = num;    }    return res;}

public int[] intersection(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {    Set<Integer> set = new HashSet<>();    Arrays.sort(nums1);    Arrays.sort(nums2);    int i = 0, j = 0;    while (i < nums1.length && j < nums2.length) {        // ç›¸ç­‰ï¼ŒåŠ å…¥é›†åˆ        if (nums1[i] == nums2[j]) {            set.add(nums1[i]);            i++;            j++;        } else if (nums1[i] > nums2[j]) {            // num2[j] å¤ªå°ï¼Œå¾€åæŸ¥æ‰¾            j++;        } else {            i++;        }    }    int[] res = new int[set.size()];    int k = 0;    for (int num : set) {        res[k++] = num;    }    return res;}

äºŒåˆ†

public int[] intersection(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {    Set<Integer> set = new HashSet<>();    Arrays.sort(nums2);    // åœ¨ num2 ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾ nums1 ä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æ˜¯å¦å‡ºç°    for (int value : nums1) {        if (binarySearch(value, nums2) && !set.contains(value)) {            set.add(value);        }    }    int[] res = new int[set.size()];    int k = 0;    for (int num : set) {        res[k++] = num;    }    return res;}private boolean binarySearch(int target, int[] nums) {    int len = nums.length;    int left = 0;    int right = len - 1;    while (left <= right) {        int mid = (left + right) >> 1;        if (nums[mid] == target) {            return true;        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {            right = mid - 1;        } else {            left = mid + 1;        }    }    return false;}

entry.title: LeetCode 227. åŸºæœ¬è®¡ç®—å™¨ II
entry.content:
227. åŸºæœ¬è®¡ç®—å™¨ II

public int calculate(String s) {        char[] chars = s.toCharArray();        Deque<Integer> stack = new ArrayDeque<>();        // æ¯ä¸ªæ•°å­—å‰çš„ç¬¦å·        char sign = '+';        int num = 0;        int len = chars.length;        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {            char c = chars[i];            // è½¬æ¢æ•°å­—            if (Character.isDigit(c)) {                num = num * 10 + (c - '0');            }            // åªèƒ½åœ¨è¿™é‡Œå»é™¤ç©ºæ ¼ï¼Œè‹¥ç©ºæ ¼åœ¨æœ€åä¸€ä½ï¼Œä¼šè·³è¿‡è®¡ç®—ç»“æœ            if ((!Character.isDigit(c) && c != ' ') || i == len - 1) {                switch (sign) {                    case '+':                        stack.push(num);                        break;                    case '-':                        stack.push(-num);                        break;                    case '*':                        stack.push(stack.pop() * num);                        break;                    case '/':                        stack.push(stack.pop() / num);                        break;                    default:                        break;                }                // æ›´æ–°ç¬¦å·                sign = c;                // é‡ç½®æ•°å­—                num = 0;            }        }        int res = 0;        while (!stack.isEmpty()) {            res += stack.pop();        }        return res;    }

public int[] twoSum(int[] nums, int target) {    Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();    int[] res = new int[2];    for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {        int another = target - nums[i];        if (map.containsKey(another)) {            res[0] = i;            res[1] = map.get(another);            break;        }        map.put(nums[i], i);    }    return res;}

public int subarraySum(int[] nums, int k) {    int count = 0;    // å½“å‰å‰ç¼€å’Œ sum, ä¹‹å‰çš„æŸä¸ªå‰ç¼€å’Œ preSum    // sum - preSum = kï¼ŒpreSum å‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•°å°±æ˜¯å½“å‰ä½ç½®å’Œä¸º k çš„ä¸ªæ•°    int sum = 0;    // key: å‰ç¼€å’Œ value: è¯¥å‰ç¼€å’Œå‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•°    Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();    map.put(0, 1);    for (int num : nums) {        sum += num;        int preSum = sum - k;        // è·å– æœ‰å¤šå°‘ä¸ª preSumï¼Œä½¿å¾— sum - preSum = k        if (map.containsKey(preSum)) {            count += map.get(preSum);        }        // æ›´æ–°å‰ç¼€å’Œ        map.put(sum, map.getOrDefault(sum, 0) + 1);    }    return count;}

entry.title: LeetCode 224. åŸºæœ¬è®¡ç®—å™¨
entry.content:
224. åŸºæœ¬è®¡ç®—å™¨

public int calculate(String s) {    /*        æ•°å­—ï¼šå…¥ numStack        è¿ç®—ç¬¦ï¼šè¿›è¡ŒåŠ å‡è¿ç®—ç›´åˆ°æ ˆç©ºæˆ–é‡åˆ° '('        '(': å…¥ opStack        ')': å‡ºæ ˆå¹¶è®¡ç®—ç›´åˆ°é‡åˆ° '('    */    char[] chars = s.toCharArray();    Deque<Integer> numStack = new ArrayDeque<>();    Deque<Character> opStack = new ArrayDeque<>();    int num = -1;    for (char c : chars) {        // é‡åˆ°æ•°å­—ï¼Œç»„åˆæ•°å­—å¹¶å‹å…¥ numStack        if (Character.isDigit(c)) {            num = num == -1 ? c - '0' : num * 10 + c - '0';        } else {            // æ•°å­—å…¥æ ˆ            if (num != -1) {                numStack.push(num);                num = -1;            }            // è¿ç®—ç¬¦ï¼Œè¿›è¡ŒåŠ å‡è¿ç®—ç›´åˆ°æ ˆç©ºæˆ–é‡åˆ° '('            if (isOperation(c)) {                while (!opStack.isEmpty()) {                    if (opStack.peek() == '(') {                        break;                    }                    int ans = calc(numStack, opStack);                    numStack.push(ans);                }                // å½“å‰è¿ç®—ç¬¦å…¥æ ˆ                opStack.push(c);            } else if (c == '(') {                // '(' ç›´æ¥å…¥æ ˆ                opStack.push(c);            } else if (c == ')') {                // ')': å‡ºæ ˆå¹¶è®¡ç®—ç›´åˆ°é‡åˆ° ')'                while (opStack.peek() != '(') {                    int ans = calc(numStack, opStack);                    numStack.push(ans);                }                // å°† '(' å‡ºæ ˆ                opStack.pop();            }        }    }    if (num != -1) {        numStack.push(num);    }    // è‹¥ æ“ä½œç¬¦æ ˆä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œç»§ç»­è¿ç®—    while (!opStack.isEmpty()) {        int ans = calc(numStack, opStack);        numStack.push(ans);    }    return numStack.pop();}/** * ä» numStack ä¸­å‡ºæ ˆä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å‡è¿ç®— * * @param numStack æ•°å­—æ ˆ * @param opStack  æ“ä½œç¬¦æ ˆ * @return */private int calc(Deque<Integer> numStack, Deque<Character> opStack) {    int num1 = numStack.pop();    int num2 = numStack.pop();    char op = opStack.pop();    if (op == '+') {        return num1 + num2;    } else {        return num2 - num1;    }}/** * åˆ¤æ–­ c æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºè¿ç®—ç¬¦ * * @param c * @return */private boolean isOperation(char c) {    return c == '+' || c == '-' || c == '*' || c == '/';}

public boolean isIsomorphic(String s, String t) {    return check(s, t) && check(t, s);}public boolean check(String s, String t) {    int len = s.length();    Map<Character, Character> map = new HashMap<>();    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        char c = s.charAt(i);        char key = t.charAt(i);        if (map.containsKey(key)) {            char target = map.get(key);            if (c != target) {                return false;            }        } else {            map.put(key, c);        }    }    return true;}
public boolean isIsomorphic(String s, String t) {    // åŒå‘éªŒè¯    return check(s, t) && check(t, s);}public boolean check(String s, String t) {    int len = s.length();    int[] map = new int[128];    char[] chars1 = s.toCharArray();    char[] chars2 = t.toCharArray();    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        int target = map[chars1[i]];        // åˆ¤æ–­å¯¹åº”ä½ç½®æ˜¯å¦åŒ¹é…        if (target != 0) {            if (target != chars2[i]) {                return false;            }        }        // æ–°å¢ map        map[chars1[i]] = chars2[i];    }    return true;}

public int minDistance(String word1, String word2) {    int rows = word1.length();    int cols = word2.length();    char[] chars1 = word1.toCharArray();    char[] chars2 = word2.toCharArray();    int[][] dp = new int[rows + 1][cols + 1];    for (int i = 1; i <= rows; i++) {        dp[i][0] = i;    }    for (int i = 1; i <= cols; i++) {        dp[0][i] = i;    }    for (int i = 1; i <= rows; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= cols; j++) {            if (chars1[i - 1] == chars2[j - 1]) {                dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1];            } else {                dp[i][j] = 1 + Math.min(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i][j - 1]);            }        }    }    return dp[rows][cols];}

public boolean isMatch(String s, String p) {    int rows = p.length();    int cols = s.length();    char[] sChars = s.toCharArray();    char[] pChars = p.toCharArray();    boolean[][] dp = new boolean[rows + 1][cols + 1];    dp[0][0] = true;    // è‹¥ä»¥ '*' å¼€å§‹ï¼Œåˆ™ p å¯ä»¥åŒ¹é… ç©ºä¸²    for (int i = 1; i <= rows; i++) {        if (pChars[i - 1] == '*') {            dp[i][0] = true;        } else {            break;        }    }    for (int i = 1; i <= rows; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= cols; j++) {            // å¯¹åº”å­—ç¬¦åŒ¹é… || p[j] == '?' å¯åŒ¹é…ä»»æ„å­—ç¬¦            if (sChars[j - 1] == pChars[i - 1] || pChars[i - 1] == '?') {                dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1];            } else if (pChars[i - 1] == '*') {                // '*' å¯åŒ¹é…ä»»æ„é•¿åº¦                dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j] || dp[i][j - 1];            }        }    }    return dp[rows][cols];}

entry.title: LeetCode 10. æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼åŒ¹é…
entry.content:
10. æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼åŒ¹é…

dp[i][j] è¡¨ç¤º s[0:i] æ˜¯å¦èƒ½åŒ¹é…åˆ° p[0:j]

  • s[i] == p[j]ï¼Œå¯¹åº”ä½ç½®åŒ¹é…
    dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1]
  • p[j] == '.'ï¼Œ'.' å¯ä»¥åŒ¹é…ä»»æ„å­—ç¬¦
    dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1]
  • s[i] != p[j]ï¼Œè‹¥ p[j] != '*'ï¼Œåˆ™è‚¯å®šæ— æ³•åŒ¹é…ï¼Œåªæœ‰å½“ * æ—¶æ‰æœ‰å¯èƒ½æ¶ˆé™¤ä¸åŒ¹é…çš„å­—ç¬¦ã€‚
    • s[i] != p[j - 1]ï¼Œ * çš„å‰ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸ s[i] æ— æ³•åŒ¹é…ï¼Œåˆ™æ¶ˆå» s[i]ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ #* ä»£è¡¨ # å– 0 ä¸ªã€‚
      dp[i][j] = dp[j - 2]
    • s[i] == p[j - 1]ï¼Œ * çš„å‰ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸ s[i] åŒ¹é…ï¼Œåˆ™ p[j - 2] å¯ä»¥å– 0 ä¸ªï¼Œ 1 ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ª
      dp[i][j] = dp[j - 2] || dp[i][j - 1] || dp[i - 1][j]
      • å– 0 ä¸ªï¼šaab - aab b*
      • å– 1 ä¸ªï¼šaab - aa b*
      • å– n ä¸ªï¼šaabbbb - aa b*
public boolean isMatch(String s, String p) {    int rows = s.length();    int cols = p.length();    boolean[][] dp = new boolean[rows + 1][cols + 1];    // ç©ºä¸²è‚¯å®šèƒ½åŒ¹é…    dp[0][0] = true;    for (int i = 2; i <= cols; i++) {        if (p.charAt(i - 1) == '*' && dp[0][i - 2]) {            dp[0][i] = true;        }    }    for (int i = 1; i <= rows; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= cols; j++) {            // s å’Œ p å½“å‰åŒ¹é…åˆ°çš„å­—ç¬¦            char sc = s.charAt(i - 1);            char pc = p.charAt(j - 1);            // i, j åŒ¹é…æˆ– j å¯å–ä»»æ„å€¼            if (sc == pc || pc == '.') {                dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1];            } else if (pc == '*') {                // `*` çš„å‰ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦                char last = p.charAt(j - 2);                // last ä¸ s çš„å½“å‰ä½ç½®åŒ¹é…ï¼Œåˆ™ last å¯å– 1 ä½æˆ–å¤šä½                if (sc == last || last == '.') {                    dp[i][j] = dp[i][j - 1] || dp[i - 1][j];                }                // å°è¯•ä¸å– last                dp[i][j] = dp[i][j] || dp[i][j - 2];            }        }    }    return dp[rows][cols];}

entry.title: LeetCode 5. æœ€é•¿å›æ–‡å­ä¸²

  • å¦‚æœä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„å¤´å°¾ä¸¤ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œæ‰æœ‰å¿…è¦ç»§ç»­åˆ¤æ–­ä¸‹å»ã€‚

    • å¦‚æœé‡Œé¢çš„å­ä¸²ä¸æ˜¯å›æ–‡ä¸²ï¼Œæ•´ä½“å°±ä¸æ˜¯å›æ–‡ä¸²ã€‚

çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼šdp[i][j] = s[i] == s[j] and dp[i + 1][j - 1]

public String longestPalindrome(String s) {    int len = s.length();    if (len == 0) {        return "";    }    boolean[][] dp = new boolean[len][len];    // èµ·ç‚¹    int start = 0;    // å›æ–‡é•¿åº¦    int maxLen = 1;    char[] chars = s.toCharArray();    for (int j = 1; j < len; j++) {        for (int i = 0; i < j; i++) {            // ä¸¤ä¾§ä¸ç­‰ï¼Œä¸€å®šæ— æ³•æ„æˆå›æ–‡            if (chars[i] != chars[j]) {                dp[i][j] = false;            } else { Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â // i, j ä¹‹é—´çš„å­ä¸²åªæœ‰ 0 ä¸ªæˆ– 1 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦                if (j - i <= 2) {                    dp[i][j] = true;                } else {                    // ä¸¤ä¾§ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œçœ‹å­ä¸²æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯å›æ–‡                    dp[i][j] = dp[i + 1][j - 1];                }            }            // æ›´æ–°æœ€é•¿å›æ–‡ä½ç½®            if (dp[i][j] && j - i + 1 > maxLen) {                maxLen = j - i + 1;                start = i;            }        }    }    return s.substring(start, start + maxLen);}

ä¸­å¿ƒæ‰©æ•£

å°è¯•ä»¥æ¯ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦å’Œæ¯ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦é—´çš„é—´éš™ä¸ºä¸­å¿ƒï¼Œå‘ä¸¤ç«¯æ‰©æ•£ã€‚

public String longestPalindrome(String s) {    char[] str = s.toCharArray();    int len = str.length;    int maxLen = 1;    int begin = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < len - 1; i++) {        // å¥‡æ•°æ‰©æ•£ï¼Œä»¥ s[i] ä¸ºä¸­å¿ƒ        int[] res1 = centerSpread(str, i, i);        // å¶æ•°æ‰©æ•£ï¼Œä»¥ s[i], s[i + 1] ä¸ºä¸­å¿ƒ        int[] res2 = centerSpread(str, i, i + 1);        int[] res = res1[1] > res2[1] ? res1 : res2;        // æ›´æ–°é•¿åº¦        if (res[1] > maxLen) {            maxLen = res[1];            begin = res[0];        }    }    return s.substring(begin, begin + maxLen);}private int[] centerSpread(char[] str, int left, int right) {    int len = str.length;    // ç»“æŸå¾ªç¯æ—¶ï¼Œstr[left] != str[right] æˆ–è¶Šç•Œ    // å– str(left:right)    while (left > 0 && right < len) {        if (str[left] != str[right]) {            break;        }        left--;        right++;    }    return new int[]{left + 1, right - left - 1};}
